data.title: What is NetSuite ERP Software? | KPI
data.meta_description: Oracle NetSuite ERP is an integrated cloud business software used by thousands of businesses for ERP, CRM, Operations, Accounting, Reporting, and MIS requirements. KPI is a NetSuite Solution Provider
data.text:
NetSuite is the One-Source- Of-Truth for all your business functions and data.

One source of truth simply means ONE business system that provides the framework for all important business functions and data. NetSuite is capable of supporting all your business functions in one place - from Purchasing to Finance and everything else in between. NetSuite acts as the source of all of the company’s critical data in one platform which can be accessed in real-time, allowing a proactive approach in managing business.

7 Ways Cloud ERP Helps Businesses to Grow

Can You Make Well-Informed, Quick Decisions in Today’s Unpredictable Business Environment? Unless you have organizational visibility and mission-critical data on a single platform, responding and adapting at pace to risks and opportunities is a huge challenge for growing businesses. Read this Whitepaper to learn the 7 ways in which a cloud enterprise resource planning (ERP) solution could be the solution for your business.

8 Minutes Read, Published 2021,

Owner: Oracle NetSuite

A Guide To Continuous Accounting: Smart Approach to Better, Faster Decision-Making

Traditional approaches to managing the accounting cycle not only drive up costs and increase the risk of errors but also delay access to critical financial data. In today’s ever-changing business environment, organizations need real-time information and metrics to inform decisions and quickly evaluate the results. Download Whitepaper to learn about the smart approach to better and faster decision-making.

8 Minutes Read, Published 2021,

Owner: Oracle NetSuite

Money In The Bank: 6 Ways To Run A More Profitable Business

Increased profits are both a top success factor, and, along with achieving revenue goals, understandably a major source of anxiety for 2020. Download Report to see the six money-making techniques that all companies can use to ensure profitability while making operations more efficient and tapping into new market opportunities.

11 Minutes Read, Published 2020,

Owner: Oracle NetSuite

3 Essentials for a Digital Office of Finance

Technology will automate an increasing amount of rote and repetitive work, enabling a new generation of finance and accounting executives to provide their workforce with tools that help them to avoid tedious, soul-deadening toil. Download this report by Ventana Research to see the benefits of digitalizing financial processes.

6 Minutes Read, Published 2020,

Owner: Oracle NetSuite
